mapper.insert: insert into process_info (process_inst_id, avy_id, tpl_no, executor_id, process_tpcd, class_no, tms, function_id, decision, decision_desc, owner_id) values( #{processInstId}, #{avyId}, #{tplNo}, #{executorId}, #{processTpcd}, #{classNo}, #{tms}, #{functionId}, #{decision}, #{decisionDesc}, #{ownerId})
mapper.update: update process_info set process_tpcd = #{processTpcd}, avy_id = #{avyId}, executor_id = #{executorId}, decision = #{decision}, decision_desc = #{decisionDesc}, class_no = #{classNo}, tms = #{tms}, owner_id = #{ownerId} where process_inst_id = #{processInstId}
mapper.select: select process_inst_id as processInstId, owner_id as ownerId, avy_id as avyId, tpl_no as tplNo, executor_id as executorId, process_tpcd as processTpcd, class_no as classNo, function_id as functionId, decision as decision, decision_desc as decisionDesc from process_info where process_inst_id = #{processInstId}
